<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
We compiled an extensive database on the production of multiple crop types and livestock. We mined data from open repositories, often digitizing data from regions such as the middle east, Russia and China.
</p>

<div style="width=80%;margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;background-color:#777777;">

# data call without specifying subdataset and resolution
list_data("agriStats")

# data call for specific subdataset 
list_data("agriStats/TBD")

# data call to subdataset with a specific resolution
